column4: yay.......... i ALMOST installed that damn ndiswrapper....... can anyone tell a noob how i can make sure i have my DEPENDENCIES  in order?
what dependencies?
hell if i know
that what it tells me when i try to install the deb
for ndiswrapper
i wen in terminal
are you installing it from apt?
apt should install the dependencies for you
no i can't, i can't set up my internet so i have no access to online
so how do i manually install them?
or if there is an easier way, i would like to know
well if you put the other .debs in the same folder as the ndiswrapper, dpkg should install all of the needed files
how do i know if i have all the debs?
dpkg should spit out what it is depending on
all i downloaded was a file called ndiswrapper-modules2.6.deb
was that built for ubuntu?
i went ahead and built the ndiswrapper for source
i'm not sure, i thought all debs relate to debian-based linux systems like ubunt
well it has to match the kernel version in ubuntu.  if not, it'll have to be rebuilt
and in that case, you might as well download the tar.gz and build it
i'm new to ubuntu, i have ver 6.10 edgy
i think my kernel ver in usr/src/ is ver 2.6(maybe a 2.6.7.1 or somthing like that)
what kernel version comes with 6.10 edgy ubuntu??????????
